# The `FormParams` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A helper struct providing information about the byte size of DW&#95;FORM values that vary in size depending on the DWARF version, address byte size, or DWARF32/DWARF64. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::dwarf::FormParams</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A helper struct providing information about the byte size of DW&#95;FORM values that vary in size depending on the DWARF version, address byte size, or DWARF32/DWARF64.

Definition at line 1084 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">Dwarf.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getDwarfOffsetByteSize() {#a235a5f4eedbfa7b5583ba320309d408f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::dwarf::FormParams::getDwarfOffsetByteSize () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The size of a reference is determined by the DWARF 32/64-bit format.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h/#l01102">1102</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">Dwarf.h</a>.

### getRefAddrByteSize() {#a6385ddcd0042b7b98875ab684a115f2e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::dwarf::FormParams::getRefAddrByteSize () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The definition of the size of form DW&#95;FORM&#95;ref&#95;addr depends on the version.

In DWARF v2 it&#39;s the size of an address; after that, it&#39;s the size of a reference.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h/#l01095">1095</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">Dwarf.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
